title: Austria Wants to Stick to Normal Timetable on Next ECB Chief
description: Austrian Finance Minister Markus Marterbauer said he backs sticking with the standard timeline in appointing the next European Central Bank president.
content: Austrian Finance Minister Markus Marterbauer said he backs sticking with the standard timeline in appointing the next European Central Bank president.
